Jens Stavnstrup (js@ddre.dk).

author: deweese
msg: Merged an optimization to invalidateGeometry method.

author: deweese
msg: WARNING: This commit includes extensive changes and may introduce some
regressions (although we are not currently aware of any).
1) Fixes to textLength to handle bugs pointed out by J. Davis Eisenberg
there are still problems when applying textLength to text elements
containing tspans (expect a fix for this shortly).
2) A complete implementation of the proposed solidColor element from
SVG 1.1, and a new test file for said feature.
3) Initial Dynamic SVG support!!!! Currently only supports changing
a rect element (see samples/tests/spec/scripting).  However
Event propogation, dirty region computation and what not are
all functional, expect optimizations and increased functionality
to follow.
